zombiecure1.mix_message: The mixture into a dark green paste.
zombiecure1.name: Anti-Plague Sequence Alpha

water.mix_message: Water pools as the ice melts.
water.name: Water

vhfcs.mix_message: The mixture emits a sickly-sweet smell.
vhfcs.name: vhfcs

triple_citrus.mix_message: The citrus juices begin to blend together.
triple_citrus.name: triple_citrus

teslium.mix_message: A jet of sparks flies from the mixture as it merges into a flickering slurry.
teslium.name: Teslium

teporone.mix_message: The mixture turns an odd lavender color.
teporone.name: Teporone

synthflesh.mix_message: The mixture knits together into a fibrous, bloody mass.
synthflesh.name: Synthflesh

uplink.mix_message: The chemicals mix to create a shiny, orange substance.
uplink.name: Uplink

trinary.mix_message: The ingredients mix into a colorful substance.
trinary.name: Trinary

synthnsoda.mix_message: The chemicals mix to create a smooth, fizzy substance.
synthnsoda.name: Synth 'n Soda

synthignon.mix_message: The chemicals mix to create a fine, red substance.
synthignon.name: Synthignon

servo.mix_message: The ingredients mix into a dark brown substance.
servo.name: Servo

robottears.mix_message: The ingredients combine into a stiff, dark goo.
robottears.name: Robot Tears

synthanol.mix_message: The chemicals mix to create shiny, blue substance.
synthanol.name: Synthanol

surge.mix_message: The mixture congeals into a metallic green gel that crackles with electrical activity.
surge.name: Surge

fluorosurfactant.mix_message: A head of foam results from the mixture's constant fizzing.
fluorosurfactant.name: Foam surfactant

super_hairgrownium.mix_message: The liquid becomes amazingly furry and smells peculiar.
super_hairgrownium.name: Super Hairgrownium

sacid.mix_message: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
sacid.name: Sulfuric Acid

sulfonal.mix_message: The mixture gives off quite a stench.
sulfonal.name: sulfonal

suicider.mix_message: The drinks and chemicals mix together, emitting a potent smell.
suicider.name: Suicider

styptic_powder.mix_message: The solution yields an astringent powder.
styptic_powder.name: Styptic Powder

stabilizing_agent.mix_message: The mixture becomes a yellow liquid!
stabilizing_agent.name: stabilizing_agent

spaceacillin.mix_message: The solvent extracts an antibiotic compound from the fungus.
spaceacillin.name: Spaceacillin

space_drugs.mix_message: Slightly dizzying fumes drift from the solution.
space_drugs.name: Space Drugs

cleaner.mix_message: Ick, this stuff really stinks. Sure does make the container sparkle though!
cleaner.name: Space cleaner

sorium_explosion.mix_message: The mixture explodes with a big bang.
sorium_explosion.name: Sorium Explosion

sorium.mix_message: The mixture pops and crackles before settling down.
sorium.name: Sorium

sonic_powder.mix_message: The mixture begins to bubble slighly!
sonic_powder.name: sonic_powder

sodiumchloride.mix_message: The solution crystallizes with a brief flare of light.
sodiumchloride.name: Sodium Chloride

smoke_powder.mix_message: The mixture sets into a greyish powder!
smoke_powder.name: smoke_powder

epinephrine.mix_message: Tiny white crystals precipitate out of the solution.
epinephrine.name: Epinephrine

silver_sulfadiazine.mix_message: A strong and cloying odor begins to bubble from the mixture.
silver_sulfadiazine.name: Silver Sulfadiazine

sarin.mix_message: The mixture yields a colorless, odorless liquid.
sarin.name: sarin

sanguine_reagent.mix_message: The mixture bubbles furiously for a moment, then condenses into a sanguine gel.
sanguine_reagent.name: Sanguine Reagent

salbutamol.mix_message: The solution bubbles freely, creating a head of bluish foam.
salbutamol.name: Salbutamol

rotatium.mix_message: After sparks, fire, and the smell of LSD, the mix is constantly spinning with no stop in sight.
rotatium.name: Rotatium

pump_up.mix_message: The mixture congeals into a black paste
pump_up.name: pump up

potass_iodide.mix_message: The solution settles calmly and emits gentle fumes.
potass_iodide.name: Potassium Iodide

phlogiston.mix_message: The substance becomes sticky and extremely warm.
phlogiston.name: Phlogiston

phlogiston_dust.mix_message: The substance becomes a pile of burning dust.
phlogiston_dust.name: Phlogiston Dust

phenol.mix_message: The mixture bubbles and gives off an unpleasant medicinal odor.
phenol.name: phenol

pestkiller.mix_message: The mixture gives off a harsh odor
pestkiller.name: Pest Killer

perfluorodecalin.mix_message: The mixture rapidly turns into a dense pink liquid.
perfluorodecalin.name: Perfluorodecalin

pen_acid.mix_message: The substance becomes very still, emitting a curious haze.
pen_acid.name: Pentetic Acid

pancuronium.mix_message: The mixture deepens to a dark blue, leaving no smell.
pancuronium.name: Pancuronium

osseous_reagent.mix_message: Shards of a bone-like substance start to form in the liquid.
osseous_reagent.name: Osseous Reagent

oil.mix_message: An iridescent black chemical forms in the container.
oil.name: Oil

oculine.mix_message: The mixture settles, becoming a milky white.
oculine.name: Oculine

napalm.mix_message: The mixture congeals into a sticky gel.
napalm.name: Napalm

mutagen.mix_message: The substance turns neon green and bubbles unnervingly.
mutagen.name: Unstable mutagen

mutadone.mix_message: A foul astringent liquid emerges from the reaction.
mutadone.name: Mutadone

mephedrone.mix_message: The mixture fizzes into a vibrant red solution that doesn't stay still.
mephedrone.name: Mephedrone

menthol.mix_message: Large white crystals precipitate out of the mixture.
menthol.name: Menthol

meatslurry.mix_message: The mixture congeals into a bloody mass.
meatslurry.name: Meat Slurry

mannitol.mix_message: The mixture bubbles slowly, making a slightly sweet odor.
mannitol.name: Mannitol

ultralube.mix_message: The mixture darkens and appears to partially vaporize into a chilling aerosol.
ultralube.name: Ultra-Lube

lube.mix_message: The substance turns a striking cyan and becomes oily.
lube.name: Space Lube

lsd.mix_message: The mixture turns a rather unassuming color and settles.
lsd.name: Lysergic acid diethylamide

love.mix_message: The substance gives off a lovely scent!
love.name: pure love

liquid_solder.mix_message: The solution gently swirls with a metallic sheen.
liquid_solder.name: Liquid Solder

liquid_dark_matter.mix_message: The mixture begins to glow in a dark purple.
liquid_dark_matter.name: Liquid Dark Matter

lazarus_reagent.mix_message: The substance begins moving on its own somehow.
lazarus_reagent.name: Lazarus Reagent

krokodil.mix_message: The mixture dries into a pale blue powder.
krokodil.name: Krokodil

jestosterone.mix_message: The substance quickly shifts colour, cycling from red, to yellow, to green, to blue, and finally settles at a vibrant fuchsia.
jestosterone.name: Jestosterone

jenkem.mix_message: The mixture ferments into a filthy morass.
jenkem.name: Jenkem

itching_powder.mix_message: The mixture congeals and dries up, leaving behind an abrasive powder.
itching_powder.name: Itching Powder

initropidril.mix_message: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the unpleasant milky substance.
initropidril.name: Initropidril

ice.mix_message: Ice forms as the water freezes.
ice.name: Ice

hydrogenated_soybeanoil.mix_message: The mixture emits a burnt, oily smell.
hydrogenated_soybeanoil.name: Partially hydrogenated space-soybean oil

holywater.mix_message: The water somehow seems purified. Or maybe defiled.
holywater.name: Holy Water

haloperidol.mix_message: The chemicals mix into an odd pink slush.
haloperidol.name: Haloperidol

gravy.mix_message: The substance thickens and takes on a meaty odor.
gravy.name: Gravy

ginsonic.mix_message: The drink turns electric blue and starts quivering violently.
ginsonic.name: ginsonic

gintonic.mix_message: The tonic water and gin mix together perfectly.
gintonic.name: Gin and Tonic

formaldehyde.mix_message: Ugh, it smells like the morgue in here.
formaldehyde.name: formaldehyde

flash_powder.mix_message: The chemicals hiss and fizz briefly before falling still.
flash_powder.name: Flash powder

fernet_cola.mix_message: The ingredients mix into a dark brown godly substance
fernet_cola.name: Fernet Cola

facid.mix_message: The mixture deepens to a dark blue, and slowly begins to corrode its container.
facid.name: Fluorosulfuric Acid

ether.mix_message: The mixture yields a pungent odor, which makes you tired.
ether.name: Ether

ephedrine.mix_message: The solution fizzes and gives off toxic fumes.
ephedrine.name: Ephedrine

enzyme.mix_message: The mixture emits a horrible smell as you heat up the contents. Luckily, enzymes don't stink.
enzyme.name: Universal enzyme

eggnog.mix_message: The eggs nog together. Pretend that \"nog\" is a verb.
eggnog.name: eggnog

diethylamine.mix_message: A horrible smell pours forth from the mixture.
diethylamine.name: Diethylamine

cyanide.mix_message: The mixture gives off a faint scent of almonds.
cyanide.name: Cyanide

crank.mix_message: The mixture violently reacts, leaving behind a few crystalline shards.
crank.name: Crank

corn_syrup.mix_message: The mixture forms a viscous, clear fluid!
corn_syrup.name: corn_syrup

confetti.mix_message: The mixture congeals into a dry powder.
confetti.name: Confetti

colorful_reagent.mix_message: The substance flashes multiple colors and emits the smell of a pocket protector.
colorful_reagent.name: colorful_reagent

chocolate_milk.mix_message: The mixture turns a nice brown color.
chocolate_milk.name: Chocolate Milk

charcoal.mix_message: The mixture yields a fine black powder.
charcoal.name: Charcoal

carpet.mix_message: The substance turns thick and stiff, yet soft.
carpet.name: carpet

capulettium_plus.mix_message: The solution begins to slosh about violently by itself.
capulettium_plus.name: capulettium_plus

capulettium.mix_message: The smell of death wafts up from the solution.
capulettium.name: capulettium

calomel.mix_message: Stinging vapors rise from the solution.
calomel.name: Calomel

bath_salts.mix_message: Tiny cubic crystals precipitate out of the mixture. Huh.
bath_salts.name: bath_salts

bacchus_blessing.mix_message: The mixture turns to a sickening froth.
bacchus_blessing.name: Bacchus' Blessing

atropine.mix_message: A horrid smell like something died drifts from the mixture.
atropine.name: Atropine

atrazine.mix_message: The mixture gives off a harsh odor
atrazine.name: atrazine

applejack.mix_message: The drink darkens as the water freezes, leaving the concentrated cider behind.
applejack.name: applejack

antihol.mix_message: A minty and refreshing smell drifts from the effervescent mixture.
antihol.name: antihol

ammonia.mix_message: The mixture bubbles, emitting an acrid reek.
ammonia.name: Ammonia

acetone.mix_message: The smell of paint thinner assaults you as the solution bubbles.
acetone.name: acetone

acetic_acid.mix_message: It smells like vinegar and a bad hangover in here.
acetic_acid.name: Acetic Acid

acetaldehyde.mix_message: It smells like a bad hangover in here.
acetaldehyde.name: Acetaldehyde
